According to their website , Joe Olive , previous program manager at DARPA , says the agency has achieved significant success with GALE , which developed software capable of translating formal Arabic more accurately on first pass than human translators .Now , with BOLT , they are working to translate Mandarin Chinese and multiple dialects of Arabic into English from all types of media , specifically focused on the challenging task of informal conversational speech , email text and instant messaging .
